item.title: Eye On AI - Ilya Sutskever
item.description: I’m Craig Smith, and this is Eye on AI. This week, I talked to Ilya Sutskever, a co-founder and chief scientist of OpenAI and one of the primary minds behind the large-language model GPT-3 and its public progeny, ChatGPT, which I don’t think it’s an exaggeration to say is changing the world. This isn’t the first time Ilya has changed the world. Jeff Hinton has said he was the main impetus for AlexNet, the convolutional neural network
